title: Was the school's career planned in response to the Parkland collective shooting?
subtitle: School departures and protests are planned in Washington, D.C., in response to a fatal shooting at the school in February 2018 in Florida.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: It is planned that the departure from schools and protests will be carried out in response to the shooting at Parkland School on 14 February 2018, resulting in the death of 17 people.
